Name: Lilac Pansy
SeedDescription: Plant them in winter. Take 6 days to produce a beautiful flower.
SeedPurchaseRequirements: z spring, z summer, z fall

SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Sähen im Winter. Es brauch 6 Tage Zeitm, um eine schöne Blume zu produzieren.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en hiver. Il faudra 6 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте зимой. Через 6 дней вырастает красивый сиреневый цветок.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 在冬天种植，需要6天长出美丽的花朵
